examples: We spent the day at the beach.
The beach was crowded with tourists.
A praia estava lotada de turistas.

suggested: Why did the sand blush? Because the seaweed.
Feeling melancholy and wistful when leaving the beach after a perfect day, wishing the moment could last forever.
Feeling angry and frustrated with the litter and pollution that can ruin the beauty and tranquility of a pristine beach.
It can be surprising to discover the diverse marine life and ecosystems that exist just beneath the surface of the water, invisible to beachgoers.
The smell of saltwater, sunscreen and coconut oil can evoke memories of summer vacations and relaxation.
The tactile experience of walking barefoot on the warm sand, feeling the sun on your skin and the gentle waves lapping at your feet can be incredibly soothing.
The connection to the natural world when you watch the ebb and flow of the tides, and the interplay between the land, sea and sky at the horizon.
